text: Radu Gabrea (20 June 1937 - 9 February 2017) was a Romanian movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Bucharest, Romania. He directed more than twenty movies between 1969 and 2016. He was known for directing the movie Gruber's Journey (2008). Gabrea died in Bucharest on 9 February 2017, aged 79.Regizorul Radu Gabrea a murit ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Romanian movie directors Category:Romanian screenwriters Category:Writers from Bucharest
title: Radu Gabrea
